title: Fix broken static image paths and add runtime image fallbacks

requirements.summary: Correct all referenced static image paths and ensure required images exist under frontend/public with exact filename casing.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /, /books, and /about shows no broken images (no empty image boxes).
The following paths resolve to actual static files (no 404s): siteContent.hero.backgroundImage, each entry in siteContent.books[].coverImage, and siteContent.about.portraitImage.
All image filenames referenced in code match the exact filenames present under frontend/public (including case sensitivity).

file_operations.description: Update siteContent asset paths to match the actual static files: set Torment coverImage to /assets/generated/book-torment-cover.dim_1600x2560.png; ensure hero backgroundImage remains /assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png; ensure coming-soon cover remains /assets/generated/book-coming-soon-cover.dim_1600x2560.png; set about.portraitImage to /assets/uploads/jeffrey-butler-portrait.png.
Add the generated hero background image as a static asset at this exact path and filename so production builds can resolve siteContent.hero.backgroundImage.
Add the generated Torment cover image as a static asset at this exact path and filename so production builds can resolve siteContent.books[].coverImage for Torment.
Add the generated coming-soon cover placeholder image as a static asset at this exact path and filename so production builds can resolve siteContent.books[].coverImage for the in-progress book.
Add the author portrait image as a static asset at this exact path and filename (including case) so production builds can resolve siteContent.about.portraitImage.

requirements.summary: Add a reusable image component that swaps to a local placeholder when book cover/portrait images fail to load, without infinite onError loops.
acceptanceCriteria: If any cover/portrait image fails to load, the UI displays a local placeholder image instead.
Fallback behavior works on Home, Books, and About pages.
No infinite onError loops occur when applying the fallback.

file_operations.description: Create a small reusable SafeImage component that wraps an with an onError handler to swap to a provided local fallbackSrc once (guarded to prevent infinite loops).

Use the new SafeImage component for each featured book cover image and provide a local fallback (use /assets/generated/book-coming-soon-cover.dim_1600x2560.png) so broken cover links gracefully degrade without showing a broken image icon.

Use the new SafeImage component for each book cover image and provide a local fallback (use /assets/generated/book-coming-soon-cover.dim_1600x2560.png) so cover images gracefully degrade on the Books page.
Use the new SafeImage component for the author portrait and provide a local fallback (use /assets/generated/author-portrait-placeholder.dim_1024x1024.png) with loop prevention.
Add the generated author portrait placeholder image as a static asset at this exact path and filename for runtime fallback usage.
